itemDescription: Irish barrister and Member of Parliament

wikipedia_page.main: Christopher Hely-Hutchinson (1767–1826) was an Irish lawyer, politician and soldier.

response: Another member of the Hely-Hutchinson family was the Honourable Christopher Hely-Hutchinson (1767–1826), fifth son of Baroness Donoughmore and John Hely-Hutchison. He represented Cork City in the House of Commons. The Honourable Sir Walter Hely-Hutchinson, younger son of the fourth Earl, was the last Governor of the Cape Colony. The Honourable Tim Hely Hutchinson, second son of the eighth Earl, is a publisher.
